content: in case anyone needs more clarification on the pattern there s an additional blog post i made here 1 this is a pattern that starts in the round and ends flat i ve seen a lot of sock/moccasin/slipper patterns in the last few days as it was one of the best ideas i saw to do for a fundraiser for relay for life i couldn t get permission to use any of them to sell so i decided to come up with my own so far so good and it doesn t bear much resemblance to any other pattern why one word frills all of the patterns seemed to be about the fanciness magic_ring single_crochet trim pompoms fancy heel turns flippy things tassels ick you know what that means more dang knots not good for people who may be going through chemo - their skin in so sensitive and i m trying to make all of the projects for the relay be chemo-friendly so here s my version simple comfy and i m going to make myself a pair after this sale is over 1 http //craftingyoohooville blogspot com/2011/06/much-less-frilly-moccasins-additional html
